div.bibl: Novi Svijet Vol. IV, No. 39, April 28, 1928. MAY FIRST CELEBRATION

body.p: The Jugoslav Educational Association No. 20 is inviting all workers and friends to attend their May First evening program, and help celebrate May the 1st, dedicated to workers.
On the program we have speakers, noted singers, and a string orchestra will play popular selections. Remember, the hall is at 2250 Clybourn Avenue, Chicago.
